==Story==
{{Description|One of the two sovereigns who once stood at the apex of the aberrant species of the Fontemer. An Armored Crab that has avoided predation, and has constantly partook in hunting and eating. Its imperial title is made half in awe, and half in jest.|title=Emperor of Fire and Iron}}
